pr_title: Move BinaryData from core-experimental to core

timeline.message: Move BinaryData from core-experimental to core

timeline.bodyText: Are we able to remove the unreleased azure-core-experimental tag with BinaryData moving into azure-core?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -176,6 +176,7 @@ com.microsoft:microsoft-opentelemetry-exporter-azuremonitor;1.0.0-beta.1;1.0.0-b
 # Format;
 # unreleased_<groupId>:<artifactId>;dependency-version
 # note: The unreleased dependencies will not be manipulated with the automatic PR creation code.
+unreleased_com.azure:azure-core;1.11.0-beta.1
 unreleased_com.azure:azure-core-experimental;1.0.0-beta.9

replies.bodyText: I think this is an old entry. Even Service Bus is not using unreleased experimental version. So, it can be removed.
replies.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText:
I would change this to the following as it is net new functionality for azure-core.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - Moved `BinaryData` from `azure-core-experimental` to `azure-core`.
          
          
            
            - Added `BinaryData` which allows for a format agnostic representation of binary information.
          
      
    
    
  

(Or something along those lines)
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Did null or "" cause an exception or is this a performance enhancement?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Yeah, this caused an exception in GeoArrayTests - NPE was thrown instead of IndexOutOfBoundsException.
replies.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText:
This looks good. Just making sure,  we will be going in this order...
GA - azure-core
GA - azure-core-amqp
GA - service-bus
timeline.author: hemanttanwar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -176,6 +176,7 @@ com.microsoft:microsoft-opentelemetry-exporter-azuremonitor;1.0.0-beta.1;1.0.0-b
 # Format;
 # unreleased_<groupId>:<artifactId>;dependency-version
 # note: The unreleased dependencies will not be manipulated with the automatic PR creation code.
+unreleased_com.azure:azure-core;1.11.0-beta.1

replies.bodyText: @hemanttanwar yes, that is the order for releasing. However, this PR will be merged only after SB is fully ready to GA.
replies.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Can we also say about "Provides API to serialize/deserialize Object."  Since it is important feature.
timeline.author: hemanttanwar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,6 +2,10 @@
 
 ## 1.11.0-beta.1 (Unreleased)
 
+### New Features
+
+- Added `BinaryData` which allows for a format agnostic representation of binary information.

timeline.message: Update changelog to include ObjectSerializer support
